welcome.description_p_1: To open a bank account, we will need to verify your identity.
welcome.description_p_2: It will only take a couple of minutes.
welcome.title: Open your new bank account

camera_inactive.detail: Take a photo using the <fallback>basic camera mode</fallback> instead

camera_not_working.detail: Take a photo using the <fallback>basic camera mode</fallback> instead

photo_upload.body_passport: Take a photo of your passport photo page
photo_upload.body_license_front: Take a photo of the front of your license
photo_upload.body_license_back: Take a photo of the back of your license
photo_upload.body_id_front: Take a photo of the front of your card
photo_upload.body_id_back: Take a photo of the back of your card
photo_upload.body_selfie: Take a selfie showing your face

doc_select.title: Choose document
doc_select.subtitle: It must be an official photo ID
doc_select.list_accessibility: Documents you can use to verify your identity
doc_select.subtitle_poa: These are the documents most likely to show your current home address
doc_select.button_bill_detail: Gas, electricity, water, landline, or broadband
doc_select.button_benefits_letter_detail: Government authorised household benefits eg. Jobseeker allowance, Housing benefit, Tax credits
doc_select.button_government_letter_detail: Any government issued letter eg. Benefits entitlement, Voting letters, Tax letters, etc

alert.another_doc: Documents from that country are not currently supported — <fallback>try another document type</fallback>

upload_guide.title: Upload passport photo page
upload_guide.subtitle: Scans and photocopies are not accepted
upload_guide.image_detail_cutoff_label: Show all details — including the bottom 2 lines
upload_guide.image_detail_glare_alt: Example of a document with glare

poa_intro.title: Let's verify your %{country} address
poa_intro.subtitle: You'll need a document that:
poa_intro.list_matches_signup: Matches the address you used on signup

poa_guidance.subtitle_bank_statement: Must be issued in the last 3 months
poa_guidance.subtitle_bill: Must be issued in the last 3 months
poa_guidance.subtitle_tax_letter: Must be issued in the last 12 months
poa_guidance.subtitle_benefits_letter: Must be issued in the last 12 months
poa_guidance.subtitle_government_letter: Must be issued in the last 12 months

doc_submit.subtitle: Take a photo with your phone
doc_submit.button_link_upload: or upload photo – no scans or photocopies

xdevice_intro.title: Continue on your phone
xdevice_intro.subtitle: Here's how to do it:
xdevice_intro.list_accessibility: Steps required to continue verification on your mobile
xdevice_intro.list_item_send_phone: Send a secure link to your phone
xdevice_intro.list_item_open_link: Open the link and complete the tasks
xdevice_intro.list_item_finish: Check back here to finish the submission

get_link.title: Get your secure link
get_link.subtitle_qr: Scan the QR code with your phone
get_link.info_qr_how: How to scan a QR code
get_link.info_qr_how_list_item_camera: Point your phone’s camera at the QR code
get_link.info_qr_how_list_item_download: If it doesn’t work, download a QR code scanner from Google Play or the App Store
get_link.subtitle_sms: Send this one-time link to your phone
get_link.alert_wrong_number: Check that your number is correct
get_link.subtitle_url: Open the link on your mobile
get_link.url_field_label: Copy the link to your mobile browser

sms_sent.title: Check your mobile
sms_sent.subtitle: We've sent a secure link to %{number}
sms_sent.subtitle_minutes: It may take a few minutes to arrive
sms_sent.info_link_window: Keep this window open while using your mobile
sms_sent.info_link_expire: Your link will expire in one hour

switch_phone.title: Connected to your mobile
switch_phone.subtitle: Once you've finished we'll take you to the next step
switch_phone.info_link_window: Keep this window open while using your mobile
switch_phone.info_link_expire: Your mobile link will expire in one hour

xdevice_checklist.title: Great, that's everything we need
xdevice_checklist.subtitle: We're now ready to verify your identity

xdevice_return.title: Uploads successful
xdevice_return.subtitle: You can now return to your computer to continue
xdevice_return.body: Your computer may take a few seconds to update

xdevice_error_desktop.title: Something's gone wrong
xdevice_error_desktop.subtitle: The link only works on mobile devices

xdevice_error_restart.title: Something's gone wrong
xdevice_error_restart.subtitle: You'll need to restart your verification on your computer

error_unsupported_browser.subtitle_android: Restart the process on the latest version of Google Chrome
error_unsupported_browser.subtitle_ios: Restart the process on the latest version of Safari

permission.subtitle_cam: When prompted, you must enable camera access to continue
permission.body_cam: We cannot verify you without using your camera

permission_recovery.subtitle_cam: Recover camera access to continue face verification
permission_recovery.list_header_cam: Follow these steps to recover camera access:
permission_recovery.list_item_how_to_cam: Grant access to your camera from your browser settings
permission_recovery.list_item_action_cam: Refresh this page to restart the identity verification process

doc_confirmation.title: Check your image
doc_confirmation.body_passport: Make sure your passport details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
doc_confirmation.body_license: Make sure your license details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
doc_confirmation.body_id: Make sure your card details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
doc_confirmation.body_permit: Make sure your permit details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
doc_confirmation.body_bank_statement: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
doc_confirmation.body_bill: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
doc_confirmation.body_tax_letter: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
doc_confirmation.body_benefits_letter: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
doc_confirmation.body_image_medium: It’ll take longer to verify you if we can’t read it
doc_confirmation.body_image_poor: To smoothly verify you, we need a better photo

alert.no_doc_detail: Make sure all of the document is in the photo
alert.crop_detail: Make sure full document is visible

selfie_intro.title: Take a selfie
selfie_intro.subtitle: We'll compare it with your document
selfie_intro.list_item_face_forward: Face forward and make sure your eyes are clearly visible
selfie_intro.list_accessibility: Tips to take a good selfie

camera_inactive.title: Camera not working?
camera_inactive.detail: Check that it is connected and functional. You can also <fallback>continue verification on your phone</fallback>
camera_inactive.detail_no_fallback: Make sure your device has a working camera

camera_not_working.title: Camera not working
camera_not_working.detail: It may be disconnected. <fallback>Try using your phone instead</fallback>.
camera_not_working.detail_no_fallback: Make sure your device's camera works

timeout.title: Looks like you took too long
timeout.detail: Remember to press stop when you're done. <fallback>Redo video actions</fallback>

video_capture.body: Position your face in the oval
video_capture.body_record: Press record and follow the instructions

selfie_confirmation.title: Check selfie
selfie_confirmation.subtitle: Make sure your selfie clearly shows your face

video_intro.title: Let's make sure nobody's impersonating you
video_intro.list_accessibility: Actions to record a selfie video
video_intro.list_item_actions: We'll ask you to film yourself performing 2 simple actions

photo_upload.body_passport: Upload passport photo page from your computer
photo_upload.body_license_front: Upload front of license from your computer
photo_upload.body_license_back: Upload back of license from your computer
photo_upload.body_id_front: Upload front of card from your computer
photo_upload.body_id_back: Upload back of card from your computer
photo_upload.body_bank_statement: Provide the whole document page for best results
photo_upload.body_bill: Provide the whole document page for best results
photo_upload.body_tax_letter: Provide the whole document page for best results
photo_upload.body_benefits_letter: Provide the whole document page for best results
photo_upload.body_government_letter: Provide the whole document page for best results
photo_upload.body_selfie: Upload a selfie from your computer

interrupted_flow_error.instruction: Restart process on a different device

lazy_loading.message: An error occurred while loading the component

multiple_faces.instruction: Only your face can be in the selfie

no_face.instruction: Your face is needed in the selfie

sms_failed.instruction: Copy the link to your phone

sms_overuse.instruction: Copy the link to your phone

unsupported_file.instruction: Try using a JPG or PNG file
